long_description: we "chawla fire protection engineers" are proud to introduce ourselves as one of the leading firms engaged in the manufacturing and exporting a wide range of isi/ul marked fire protection equipment under brand name “omex” our company is an iso 9001-2015 certified company, came into effect in the year 1990, having a yearly business turn-over of inr 500 million. we are determined to stay ahead in the competitive market through providing our customers hassle free services. we have gained immense popularity and have asserted ourselves in the business market. we are supplying our products to all-prestigious government/semi government departments/local bodies, private companies specifically real estate/infrastructure’s builders/developers/ prom
